description: Document representing an unfiltered list of categories.

c_alternativeUrl.description: Renders an alternative URL in main navigation. Uses Salesforce Commerce Cloud content url notation. For example: $url('Account-Show')$ or normal URL http://xchange.demandware.com

c_catBannerID.description: Used to define the content asset used to populate a grid page banner for a category. This value is applied to all sub-category navigation (cascading) if no specific catBannerID has been defined for  a sub-category.

abs_url.description: The absolute URL with request protocol

dis_base_url.description: The DIS base URL only for product images

c_customCSSFile.description: Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this category.

c_enableCompare.description: Used to define if/when the Compare feature is to be visualized in the storefront based on navigation. If enableCompare = FALSE, no Compare checkboxes will be displayed in the grid view. If enableCompare = TRUE, the category (and its children) will support the Compare feature.

c_headerMenuOrientation.description: Which way to orient the menu and optional header menu HTML. Vertical will list all in one line. Horizontal will list in columns.

c_showInMenu.description: Used to indicate that a category (such as Mens -> Footwear -> Boots) will display in the roll-over navigation. A sub-category only shows if also the parent category is marked as showInMenu. Up to three category levels are shown in roll-over navigation.

c_sizeChartID.description: Used to define the content asset ID of the Size Chart that is appropriate for products whose PRIMARY category is the associated category (and its children). Whenever a product detail page (or quick view) is rendered, the Size Chart link is populated based on the value of this attribute for the products primary categorization. If not defined, NO size chart link is displayed.

abs_url.description: The absolute URL with request protocol

dis_base_url.description: The DIS base URL only for product images

c_slotBannerImage.description: Image used on either the top or bottom slot on the category landing pages.

catalog_id.description: The id of the catalog that contains it.

categories.description: The array of sub categories for the category.

items.description: this field is the reference to category

description.description: The localized description of the category.

image.description: The name of the category image. The URL to the image is computed.

link.description: The URL to get the category. This is a computed attribute and cannot be modified.

name.description: The localized name of the category.

online.description: The online status of the category determines if it is visible in the storefront. Defaults to false if not specified on create.

page_description.description: The localized page description of the category.

page_keywords.description: The localized page keywords for the category.

page_title.description: The localized page title of the category.

parent_category_id.description: The id of the parent category. Defaults to root if not specified on create.

items.description: Document representing most basic info (id and name) of a category or catalog.

id.description: The id of the category path.

name.description: The name of the category path.

position.description: The position of the category determines the display order in the storefront.

items.description: Document representing a product sorting rule

description.description: The description of the product sorting rule.

id.description: the id of product sorting rule.

product_sorting_rule_steps.description: the steps involved in sorting by this rule.

items.description: Document representing a product sorting rule step

direction.description: the direction of the sorting attribute

is_system.description: whether or not the attribute is a system attribute.

position.description: the position of product sorting rule step.

type_id.description: the sorting type for sorting attribute.

thumbnail.description: The name of the category thumbnail. The URL to the thumbnail is computed.

expand.description: The list of expands set for the search request. Expands are optional.

next.description: The URL of the next result page.

previous.description: The URL of the previous result page.

select.description: The fields that you want to select.

start.description: The zero-based index of the first search hit to include in the result.
